website_summaries.verdict: From the depths of the 80s surfaces another Reebok Classics silhouette traversing different platforms. The Reebok Rapide, an original runner in 1985, comes out fresh and street-ready thanks to its retro color-blocking in a smooth canvas of style. The sneaker pulls out designs cues from its 1995 predecessor and brings out the lifestyle A-game with contemporary flair. Built with comfort and function in mind, the Reebok Rapide gives retro Reebok fans another alternate silhouette for their daily grind.
pros: Almost everyone who posted their comments found the Reebok Rapide to be adequately comfortable
It was a sneaker of excellent quality with a well-made construction according to a handful of reviewers
Many customers were astonished by its unique look and beautiful design
Several wearers achieved a perfect fit with these Reebok Rapide sneakers
The sneaker comes with a very affordable price range, as prescribed by some buyers
A customer applauded its sturdy structure
The Reebok Rapide’s image stayed true to the photos online and exhibits a brilliant display of colors that many fans loved
It was a lightweight shoe according to a couple of users
A handful of those who wore the sneakers to the streets received heap loads of compliments
One commenter stated that Reebok Rapide’s build allows for quicker movements which also facilitated long hours of walking
A vegan was extremely happy to find this pair because it was made from non-leather materials
Very few customers praised the versatility of the shoe which blends well with most of their clothing
cons: A couple of unsatisfied wearers commented that the Reebok Rapide’s sole was a bit stiff
The sneaker’s flexible suede portions, according to one delicate reviewer, needs to be treated carefully
Few purchasers would like to see some more exciting colors in the future
A couple of users were disappointed that the Reebok Rapide gets dirty very quickly

customer_reviews.title: What Happened To Reebok?
customer_reviews.text: What’s happened to Reebok? These sneakers were a huge disappointment. The quality is low and the sneaker’s insole is basically a flat, uncushioned piece of material. There is zero arch support. I got a good price deal on these sneakers but had to pay another $20 for some decent insoles. I’ve even questioned whether these sneakers are “fakes” since the quality is not right. Definitely not recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkmoon 269

customer_reviews.title: A dope pair of kicks
customer_reviews.text: These Rapide Reebok classics are hella fresh,stylish and super comfortable.The craftmanship of these sneakers are flawless.I bought 2 pairs on sale and i'm thinking of getting another pair or two.Kudos to Reebok for making some great footwear.👍👟💯
customer_reviews.author: Shazim Mohammed

customer_reviews.title: A fitness inspired shoe for a new me!
customer_reviews.text: This colorway makes me swoon. I had to have them. While the weather hasn't been ideal, I took them on their maiden voyage anyway. So far, I went from the usual "WHAT ARE THOSE!?!?" to all sorts of compliments and exchanging glances. 2020 is starting off right! Keep working on yourself and the good times will come.
customer_reviews.author: MackieMarantz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome deal
customer_reviews.text: Not really into white sneakers, but needed a pair of casual shoes and Reebok's for $20 bucks is a no brainer.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel

customer_reviews.title: perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: perfect fit and size was accurate. shipping took a bit longer than expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Mc

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small got my normal size and it’s way too small too bad I didn’t try it on until after the return window! Pretty shoes tho
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle N.

customer_reviews.title: Don't get em dirty!
customer_reviews.text: The suade picks up dirt and doesn't clean off. Good shoe just cant keep clean.
customer_reviews.author: jlkidder

customer_reviews.title: Dope casual sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Nice casual sneaker for everyday casual wear. Great feel for comfort and fashion. Recommended for all the Reebok lovers
customer_reviews.author: jermel james

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shoes
customer_reviews.text: It was actually that way the picture looks & they are very comfortable to wear
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great looking!
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 9 yr old and he loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Franceshi Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Cool design, Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: I really like these shoes. They're fun colors, with a cool throwback design. They fit as expected. In the past I'd wear new balance 574 and these fit very similar to those.
customer_reviews.author: Chris
